thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St drops over 1 pct on Trump tariff fears

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St drops over 1 pct on Trump tariff fears
text:
NEW YORK, March 1 (Reuters) - The S&P 500 registered a third straight day of more than 1 percent declines on Thursday after President Donald Trump said the United States would impose import tariffs on steel and aluminum, raising concern about higher prices and a trade war.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 420.22 points, or 1.68 percent, to 24,608.98, the S&P 500 lost 36.22 points, or 1.33 percent, to 2,677.61 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 92.45 points, or 1.27 percent, to 7,180.56. (Reporting by Caroline Valetkevitch Editing by James Dalgleish)
